books.name: Yakaboo
books.description: Yakaboo is the largest online bookstore in Ukraine. It is an online organisation that is a large-scale book ecosystem that works with most of the publishing houses in Ukraine. It delivers not only in Kyiv but also to other regions of Ukraine. UAH 500 gift card.

books.name: The book `Press Reset`
books.shortDesc: Burnout and recovery in the video game industry, a book by Jason Schreier
books.description: Blood, Sweat, and Pixels is a book about the complexities of creating video games. The author has determined that games are somewhere in between art, science, technological progress and business, which seeks to create an entertaining product and make money on it. It is because of all this that the lion's share of games are delayed, and developers are working in emergency mode.

books.name: Staryi Lev
books.description: Staryi Lev Publishing House is a Ukrainian publishing house that has been creating books for the whole family, stories for all tastes and ages for over 20 years. Their publications are read not only by Ukrainian children and adults, but also by thousands of readers abroad, as their books have been translated into more than 40 countries, introducing people around the world to Ukraine and its authors. The Old Lion's online store allows you to order books from anywhere with delivery to different parts of the world. An important milestone in the publishing house's work is the social component, including collecting books for refugees and funds for humanitarian aid or support for those who need it now. 200 UAH gift card

books.name: The book 'Weapons of Victory'
books.shortDesc: Weapons of Victory by military historian and journalist Mykhailo Zhyrokhov
books.description: Weapons of Victory is not a classic non-fiction or science-pop book. It is the first complete guide to the Ukrainian army's weapons, with all the consequences that entails: there is a lot of information, it is well structured, but divided into many separate chapters and sections. It contains everything that Ukrainians have learned about over the past year and more: Javelin, HIMARS, M270, Neptune NLAW, HMMWV, Brimstone, M777, PT-91 Twardy, Bayraktar TB2, Bushmaster, etc. However, the directory does not include various foreign tanks, including Leopard 2, Challenger 2 and M1 Abrams, the F-16 aircraft, some self-propelled artillery systems, and many air and missile defence systems, such as Patriot, Skynex, etc.

books.name: Paliturka
books.shortDesc: Monthly subscription to the Paliturka online library
books.description: PALITURKA is a Ukrainian project created to support reading in Ukraine. The development of publishing is not an abstract question of values, it is a strategic task facing our country. Economic growth depends on people who read. That is why we have strengthened the publishing industry with IT technologies to help create a modern reading ecosystem in Ukraine.

games.name: AmazonPrime
games.description: Amazon is the largest online retailer in the world and one of the largest companies on the planet. It processes 3-4 million orders every day, and soon, ahead of Apple and Microsoft, it may become the first company with a capitalisation of over $1 trillion. Amazon has many divisions. The company includes not only an online store, but also a cloud service, manufacturing, and many popular websites, including the best streaming portal for gamers, Twitch. That's why Amazon Prime offers a variety of free services.

games.name: Steam
games.description: Steam is a service of Valve, a well-known video game developer that provides digital distribution, multiplayer gaming and player communication services. Steam is also used to receive automatic updates and news for both Valve's and third-party products. In addition to video games, the service offers tools for game developers, music, films and gaming equipment..

games.name: PlayStation
games.description: The Playstation Store is Sony's official online store for PlayStation Vita, PlayStation 3, PlayStation 4, and PlayStation 5. It offers paid and free games, add-ons, demos and other game content.

games.name: Twitch
games.description: Twitch is an online video streaming platform owned by Twitch Interactive, a subsidiary of Amazon. Introduced in June 2011 as an offshoot of the general distribution video streaming platform, Justin.tv, the site primarily focuses on video game streaming, including broadcasts of eSports events, creative content, a 'real life' section and more recently music broadcasts. Content on the site can be viewed live or via video on demand.

The author has determined that games are somewhere in between art, science, technological progress and business, which seeks to create an entertaining product and make money on it. It is because of all this that the lion's share of games are delayed, and developers are working in emergency mode.

gifts.name: The book 'Weapons of Victory'
gifts.shortDesc: Weapons of Victory by military historian and journalist Mykhailo Zhyrokhov
gifts.description: Weapons of Victory is not a classic non-fiction or science-pop book. It is the first complete guide to the Ukrainian army's weapons, with all the consequences that entails: there is a lot of information, it is well structured, but divided into many separate chapters and sections. It contains everything that Ukrainians have learned about over the past year and more: Javelin, HIMARS, M270, Neptune NLAW, HMMWV, Brimstone, M777, PT-91 Twardy, Bayraktar TB2, Bushmaster, etc. However, the directory does not include various foreign tanks, including Leopard 2, Challenger 2 and M1 Abrams, the F-16 aircraft, some self-propelled artillery systems, and many air and missile defence systems, such as Patriot, Skynex, etc.

Thanks to this, WOG is happy to feed its consumers with delicacies from WOG CAFE and help to get on the road, buying everything you need in WOG MARKET and make travel comfortable and unforgettable! High standards of service and the level of fuel confirmation of the ISO 9001 certificate, and wide opportunities at each station provide comfort to both the car and its owner. 200 UAH gift card.

gifts.name: 1WOG Cafe
gifts.description: WOG Cafe is a restaurant chain that takes care of the mood and diet of its visitors. The first restaurant was founded in 2015, and today there are more than 30 of them throughout the country. Aromatic coffee, democratic burgers and gourmet dishes from different cuisines of the world will appeal to everyone. 500 UAH gift card

gifts.name: The book `Press Reset`
gifts.shortDesc: Burnout and recovery in the video game industry, a book by Jason Schreier
gifts.description: Blood, Sweat, and Pixels is a book about the complexities of creating video games. The author has determined that games are somewhere in between art, science, technological progress and business, which seeks to create an entertaining product and make money on it. It is because of all this that the lion's share of games are delayed, and developers are working in emergency mode.

gifts.name: The book 'Weapons of Victory'
gifts.shortDesc: Weapons of Victory by military historian and journalist Mykhailo Zhyrokhov
gifts.description: Weapons of Victory is not a classic non-fiction or science-pop book. It is the first complete guide to the Ukrainian army's weapons, with all the consequences that entails: there is a lot of information, it is well structured, but divided into many separate chapters and sections. It contains everything that Ukrainians have learned about over the past year and more: Javelin, HIMARS, M270, Neptune NLAW, HMMWV, Brimstone, M777, PT-91 Twardy, Bayraktar TB2, Bushmaster, etc. However, the directory does not include various foreign tanks, including Leopard 2, Challenger 2 and M1 Abrams, the F-16 aircraft, some self-propelled artillery systems, and many air and missile defence systems, such as Patriot, Skynex, etc.

gifts.name: TOMMY HILFIGER
gifts.description: The Tommy Hilfiger trademark successfully combines classic and everyday in their clothing and footwear models, while always focusing on current trends. Products for adults and children are always an impeccable quality brand with a worldwide reputation. When ordering a trademark certificate, you will receive a card from MD Fashion, the exclusive representative in Ukraine. 500 UAH gift card

gifts.name: Paliturka
gifts.shortDesc: Monthly subscription to the Paliturka online library
gifts.description: PALITURKA is a Ukrainian project created to support reading in Ukraine. The development of publishing is not an abstract question of values, it is a strategic task facing our country. Economic growth depends on people who read. That is why we have strengthened the publishing industry with IT technologies to help create a modern reading ecosystem in Ukraine.

gifts.name: Kyivstar TV
gifts.description: Kyivstar TV is a digital interactive television and video library service with legal content. The platform provides access to more than 300 TV channels from all over the world, and also contains about 20,000 films, series, cartoons, shows, exclusive projects from international film studios and Ukrainian production. A large selection of diverse content will surely satisfy the taste of all members of your family, watch each one of your own on five screens separately and without loss of quality. Package ''Family'' for 3 months
